short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get news articles from local news outlets to one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is where you can look up articles of individuals from local newspapers in Pennsylvania such as:

• Times-Tribune
• Daily Local 
• Citizen's Voice 
• Standard Speaker 
• Times Leader
• Wayne Independent
• Pocono Record
• Pike County Carrier
• Chester County Press

Plus:
• Latest Twitter Alerts
• Latest Facebook Alerts

Limitation and Usage:
• Search query must be full name (first and last name.


Upcoming features will include:
• Save search
• More publications
• To search beyond first and last name
